import React, { useState, FC } from 'react' import { MessageSchema } from '../api/entities/message/message.types' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import img from '../icons/send_message.png' export const Chat: FC = () => { const { userId, chatId } = useParams() const [messageList, setMessageList] = useState([]) const [textareaValue, setTestareaValue] = useState('') const handleChangeTextareaValue = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setTestareaValue(e.target.value) } const handleSendBoxClick = () => { if (userId && chatId) { const newMessage = { id: messageList.length + 1, title: textareaValue, userId: +userId, chatId: +chatId, createdAt: new Date() } setMessageList([...messageList, newMessage]) setTestareaValue('') } } return (
{messageList.length > 0 ? <> {messageList.map((message) => { <>
123
{userId && message.userId === +userId ? <> :
{`User ${message.userId}`}
}
{message.title}
12:30
})} :
Сообщений нет
} {/*

{`User ${1}`}
}
Hello
12:30

{`User ${2}`}
}

12:30

}
